summary: The story follows a young woman as she's put through a psychological journey under the thumb of a mysterious figure who suspects her husband of stealing millions from a crime syndicate.
cast: Melissa George|Oded Fehr|Christian Campbell|Alice Krige|Connor Christopher Levins|Donald Adams|Scott Heindl|Kevan Kase|Andrew Wheeler|Blaine Anderson|Patrick Keating|Phillip Mitchell|Ken Tremblett|Douglas Chapman
title: The Betrayed
